name: European Art Market Coalition
goal:
The European Art Market Coalition brings together organisations representing the art market across Europe.

Our group includes organisations representing dealers, gallery owners and auction houses in Germany, France, Sweden, the Netherlands, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Austria and the UK.
interests: Culture, Customs, Fraud prevention, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Illegal trafficking of cultural goods to finance terrorism
Review of the Resale Rights Directive
CITIES/Wildlife trafficking
Firearms legislation
Anti-money laundering
VAT reform
Copyright reform
Data protection
